aws::graph::propositions: # Amazon Fulfillment Cost Components and Factors
Fulfillment costs primarily consist of costs incurred in operating and staffing Amazon's North America fulfillment centers.
Fulfillment costs primarily consist of costs incurred in operating and staffing Amazon's International fulfillment centers.
Fulfillment costs primarily consist of costs incurred in operating and staffing Amazon's physical stores.
Fulfillment costs primarily consist of costs incurred in operating and staffing Amazon's customer service centers.
Fulfillment costs primarily consist of payment processing costs.
AWS payment processing costs are included in "Fulfillment" category.
AWS payment processing related transaction costs are included in "Fulfillment" category.
AWS costs are primarily classified as "Technology and infrastructure."
Fulfillment costs as a percentage of net sales may vary due to payment processing and related transaction costs.
Fulfillment costs as a percentage of net sales may vary due to Amazon's level of productivity.
Fulfillment costs as a percentage of net sales may vary due to Amazon's level of accuracy.
Fulfillment costs as a percentage of net sales may vary due to changes in volume of units received and fulfilled.
Fulfillment costs as a percentage of net sales may vary due to changes in size of units received and fulfilled.
Fulfillment costs as a percentage of net sales may vary due to changes in weight of units received and fulfilled.
Fulfillment costs as a percentage of net sales may vary due to the extent to which third-party sellers utilize Fulfillment by Amazon services.
Fulfillment costs as a percentage of net sales may vary due to timing of fulfillment network expansion.
Fulfillment costs as a percentage of net sales may vary due to timing of physical store expansion.
Fulfillment costs as a percentage of net sales may vary due to the extent Amazon utilizes fulfillment services provided by third parties.
Fulfillment costs as a percentage of net sales may vary due to mix of products and services sold.
Fulfillment costs as a percentage of net sales may vary due to Amazon's ability to affect customer service contacts per unit by implementing improvements in operations.
Fulfillment costs as a percentage of net sales may vary due to Amazon's ability to affect customer service contacts per unit by enhancing customer self-service features.

/FORM 10-K/Part II/Item 7 - Managementâ€™s Discussion and Analysis of Financial Condition and Results of Operations/

text:
#### Fulfillment

Fulfillment costs primarily consist of those costs incurred in operating and staffing our North America and International fulfillment centers, physical stores, and customer service centers and payment processing costs. While AWS payment

processing and related transaction costs are included in â€œFulfillment,â€ AWS costs are primarily classified as â€œTechnology and infrastructure.â€ Fulfillment costs as a percentage of net sales may vary due to several factors, such as payment processing and related transaction costs, our level of productivity and accuracy, changes in volume, size, and weight of units received and fulfilled, the extent to which third-party sellers utilize Fulfillment by Amazon services, timing of fulfillment network and physical store expansion, the extent we utilize fulfillment services provided by third parties, mix of products and services sold, and our ability to affect customer service contacts per unit by implementing improvements in our operations and enhancements to our customer self-service features.
